Posts.Content: Aug 20, 2012 10:51AM mar2960 wrote: I also have interstial cystitis for 6 years now.. and breastcancer since dec 2011. What made my bladder painfree is low dose Naltrexone:   http://www.ic-network.com/forum/showthread.php?47685-New-incredibly-effective-treatment-for-Autoimmune-related-diseases/page4 It can also help fight the cancer:http://www.lowdosenaltrexone.org/ldn_and_cancer.htm
